thread.title: The Trumps Are Using the White House ‘Like the Kardashians Used Reality TV,’ Says Former Obama Adviser
thread.title_full: The Trumps Are Using the White House ‘Like the Kardashians Used Reality TV,’ Says Former Obama Adviser

author: Lisa Ryan
title: The Trumps Are Using the White House ‘Like the Kardashians Used Reality TV,’ Says Former Obama Adviser
text: On Wednesday, President Trump lashed out at Nordstrom on Twitter for dropping his daughter Ivanka’s brand from their stores. The previous day, his wife Melania refiled her $150 million libel lawsuit against the Daily Mail’ s parent company, saying she has lost “major business opportunities” because of... More »
